resources.string: Replaces Samsung\'s status bar clock with AOSP\'s. This allows the use of Settings.Secure.clock_seconds.
Choose the style of the AM/PM indicator (only works for 12-hour time).
Restore the old vertical Recents carousel.
It\'s strongly recommended that you reboot after applying new settings. Would you like to reboot now?
Set your QS grid to 5x3 if the header icons overlap at higher values.
